title: Your education, your way
content:
Skip to content Search Close Menu Close Academics Research Admissions Campus Life Medicine About Work Here Visit Give SEARCH Commencement Weekend 2024 Join the celebration Your education, your way Students at Rochester forge their own path. Whether itâs through
						research opportunities, our flexible curriculum, or rich campus
						culture, thereâs plenty of ways to take your education to the next
						level. Majors and programs Flexible curriculum Research in action Tradition, ever better Class of 2024: Congratulations on your accomplishments! Commencement Weekend kicks off May 17 with a
							distinctly Rochester ceremony for all graduates. Celebrations continue through May 19. #UR2024 Discover Commencement News and updates Design capstones let students create real-world solutions Each year, our engineering students work on a final project, which gives them hands-on opportunities to
							work with real clients, conduct interdisciplinary research, and engage in global experiences. Engineering greatness Rochester and Albany launch new Center of Excellence in RNA research Did a magnetic field collapse trigger the emergence of animals?
